statements: UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Bolognese', cooking_instructions = 'Boil spaghetti, cook minced meat with tomato sauce, and mix together.', cooking_time = '1 hour' WHERE recipe_id = 1;

UPDATE recipes SET cooking_time = '45 minutes', recipe_name = 'Chocolate Cake', cooking_instructions = 'Mix flour, sugar, cocoa, and eggs. Bake in the oven for 30 minutes.', created_at = '2022-08-01 10:00:00' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', cooking_instructions = 'Boil pasta, fry bacon, mix with eggs and cheese', cooking_time = '30 minutes' WHERE recipe_id = 1;

UPDATE recipes SET cooking_time = '1 hour', recipe_name = 'Beef Stroganoff', cooking_instructions = 'Sear beef, cook onions, add mushrooms and sour cream', created_at = '2022-10-05 15:30:00' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipe_table SET preparation_time = 30, cooking_time = 60 WHERE recipe_name = 'Pasta Carbonara';
UPDATE cooking_instructions SET instructions = 'Mix the ingredients and cook for 10 minutes on medium heat.' WHERE step_number = 3 AND recipe_id = 1001;
UPDATE recipe_table SET preparation_time = 30, cooking_time = 45 WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_instructions SET instructions = 'Preheat the oven to 350°F' WHERE instruction_id = 3;
UPDATE recipe SET ingredients = ARRAY['salt', 'pepper', 'garlic'] WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara';
UPDATE cooking_times SET cooking_time = '1 hour 30 minutes' WHERE recipe_id = 5;
UPDATE recipe SET cooking_instructions = 'Preheat the oven to 350°F, and bake for 30 minutes.' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_times SET cooking_time = '1 hour' WHERE recipe_id = 2;

UPDATE recipe SET recipe_name='Spaghetti Aglio e Olio', ingredients=['spaghetti', 'garlic', 'olive oil'], instructions=['Cook spaghetti', 'Saute garlic in olive oil', 'Mix spaghetti with garlic and oil'] WHERE recipe_id=1;
UPDATE cooking_programs SET temperature=375, duration=45, program_name='Baking Cake' WHERE program_id=2;
UPDATE recipe SET ingredients = ['flour', 'sugar', 'eggs', 'butter'], instructions = ['mix ingredients', 'bake at 350F'] WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_programs SET temperature = 400, duration = 60 WHERE program_name = 'Baking Program';
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = ARRAY['eggs', 'milk', 'flour'] WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ovens SET manufacturer = 'OvenCo', model = 'SuperChef' WHERE oven_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET cooking_time = 60, instructions = ARRAY['Preheat the oven to 350°F', 'Mix the ingredients in a bowl'], ingredients = ARRAY['Flour', 'Sugar', 'Eggs'] WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET password_hash = '$2y$10$7YfJMzYLh/9ja.0cIfevkdxJQvNyVTjkVl4PEELALyNufL1927K2G', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
